availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Wiet A. Daniel (Johnson County, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Lawrence County, Kentucky, native. Son of Mary Daniel. Married to Marinda Lion Daniel on March 27, 1857. Father of Jesse H. Daniel, Isom P. Daniel, and Sarah F. Daniel. Resident in Johnson County in 1850. Farmer in Johnson County in 1860. Corporal in the 65th Regiment of Kentucky Militia (U.S.A.) May 21, 1864 to June 21, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 120A.
